snippet: High-grade euro zone government bond yields edged lower on Monday on expectations the ECB will this week maintain its ultra-loose monetary policy stance, while further headlines around French elections kept that country's bonds on the boil....

headline.main: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate
headline.print_headline: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate

lead_paragraph: High-grade euro zone government bond yields edged lower on Monday on expectations the ECB will this week maintain its ultra-loose monetary policy stance, while further headlines around French elections kept that country's bonds on the boil.
